response.overview: When Nusrat is released from prison after four years, his fiancee Leila, whom Suleiman made her unhappy, marries Suleiman. Qavam, Nusrat's old friend, returns from a trip and makes a deal with Nusrat to kill Suleiman while Nusrat has a witness for his innocence, and in return Nusrat kills his uncle Nasir who has taken over his father's wealth and intends to marry He is going to kill his mother. After fighting with Suleiman, Qavam informs Nusrat that Suleiman has been killed.
response.title: Shab-e aftabi
